subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: From {{zh-l|淡|dilute}} in {{zh-l|淡氣}} {{defdate|19th c.}}, referring to nitrogen diluting oxygen in the air.

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text:
Not used in Japanese. Some sources erroneously give a meaning of {{m|en|xenon}}, instead of the correct {{m|en|nitrogen}}.

The Japanese word for {{m|en|nitrogen}} is {{m|ja|窒素|tr=chisso}}.
